page.title: 04Gareth's Day
page.content: It is morning and my alarm clock has just gone off.I usually stay on until my mum calls me for breakfast.I have toast and tea.I finish it around 8.20 then I go to my room .For my school uniform I have a tie,trousers ,shirt and pullover .At 8.30 I catch the bus to school.It is a private bus and many people use it.It costs around Â£1 a week for twenty miles.At school I learn Maths,English and a number of other things.School meals cost 55p per day the food is alright.At 3.30 I catch the bus home.Usually I watch TV but sometimes I play on my computer .At 6.00 my Dad comes home and we have dinner we have a variety of food.After dinner I go and watch TV and at 9.00 I go to bed,I read for two hours and at 11.00 I go to sleep GARETH JAMES
